name: Battledozer
description:
BATTLEDOZER

Scientists from Scrapes Inc. finally managed to create imperfect artificial intelligence machine, Battledozer. For this work they used an ancient device from another world, what could go wrong?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features
  • 7 unique Battledozer models with different perks, gameplay style and other things, 2 models from the start and 5 to unlock!
  • 24 achievements are waiting for you to obtain them. From "completed tutorial" and "break some props" to the "unlock all that stuff" and "beat the game with no sweat"!
  • 3 difficulty levels, two from the start and third one is unlockable for real hardcore players!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

You can use any control schemes anytyme, even at same time, even mix it, if you want.

  • Scheme 1: Left,Right - movements, Z-fire, Up-jump, Space-pause, Esc-menu;
  • Scheme 2: A,D - movements, J-fire, K-jump, Space-pause, Esc-menu;
  • Scheme 3: Use Xbox360 Controller, X-fire, A-jump, Start-pause, Back-menu.
